document_data.caption: A set of optic aids: magnifying lens, monocle, and spectacles.
document_data.name: Optic aid
document_data.mainbody: '''Optic aids''' were small [[glass]] implements that provided visual assistance in reading or inspecting small details.

Description.Magnifying glass: A hand-held tool to help inspecting small objects. It could also be used to start a [[fire]], provided that sunlight and tinder were available.
Description.Monocle: A single lens that enhanced the vision for one eye.
Description.Spectacles: A pair of lenses that hung over the user's nose. It was considered an odd implement.

document_data.History: Magnifying glasses first became available in [[Netheril]] in {{YearlinkConvert|2984|NY}}.
document_data.Reputation: The majority of visual aids and those of the highest quality, such as magnifying glasses and spectacles, were constructed by [[gnome]]s.
